title: Riot games support email address or live chat help needed
body: Does anybody know how to reach out to riot games without submitting a support ticket, whether it is through email or live chat? Somebody hacked my account and is playing games on it but I don't want to open up a ticket so that they are aware I'm trying to fix the situation. I have all the proof I need to verify it is my account but I can't find a fast way to get support from Riot. Any help is appreciated. Thanks.

replies.body:
Hey CrownClown,

The most reliable way to receive assistance in recovering your account is through a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). You can also use a different account in order to create your ticket. 

If you really want to contact Riot Support using a different method, you can email PS at **support@riotgames.com** or use Live Chat on the Riot Support site.

> _***~~NA Support Live Chat Hours of Operation:~~***_
1 PM (Pacific) – 9 PM (Pacific)
2 PM (Mountain) – 10 PM (Mountain)
3 PM (Central) – 11 PM (Central)
4 PM (Eastern) – 12 AM (Eastern)

Unfortunately, I think their Live Chat has been down for the past few days. I've been checking multiple times since I submitted my ticket a few days ago and haven't seen the Chat option available during the hours of operation.

Live chat has been turned off due to our incoming ticket volumes the last few days. Once we normalize it will be turned on again when we can appropriately answer in a reasonable time to cover it.
Thanks, I appreciate you keeping us informed through this frustrating time!
